titleStmt.title: A narrative of God's gracious dealings with that choice Christian Mrs. Hannah Allen (afterwards married to Mr. Hatt,) reciting the great advantages the devil made of her deep melancholy, and the triumphant victories, rich and sovereign graces, God gave her over all his stratagems and devices.
titleStmt.author: Allen, Hannah.

notesStmt.note: Running title: Satan's methods and malice baffled.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
